name: Flying Gangsters - Mini Jam 60: Crime
description:
Flying Gangsters was written for Mini Jam 60: Crime
You are a super hero Cop fighting against Super Gangsters!
They can fly away to avoid your shooting.  Pause your move for at least 3 seconds to make them feel comfortable then they will get down to the ground where its easiest to shoot them. You can also jump high and shoot them in the air.
While the Gangsters  are flying, they might throw alcoholic bottles at you. Avoid the bottles or loose life.
Every Gangster shoot will get you 5 points.
More than 10 points and you will have a police car where you can hide from the alcoholic bottles. 

Instructions:
Use Space to shoot
Use F to jump
Use Left/Right Arrow keys to move
Hit the gangsters, Avoid the bottles, Use the police car to hide
When all 5 gangsters at once are hit you win!
A hit gangster can recover after few seconds and get back fighting against you 

full source code can be found at: https://github.com/scenemax3d/games/tree/master/Jam-Crime-With_pause
